Html:
This thing looks perfect for us, but I just can't get it to work.

I've followed the simple instructions at the top of the Documentation tab:
  • Using jQuery 1.7.1
  • Placed jquery.rateit.js in my /js folder, and loading it into my page with script tag
  • Placed rateit.css in my /css folder, and loading it (referencing it) with standard link tag
  • Placed a div in my code with class="rateit"
  • Placed the images in the root, and also in /js file (But where are these supposed to go?)
Nothing appears in the div - nothing at all.

What are the full list of dependencies? Because I see all kinds of other files, including a whole library of shCore.js - are those also required?

Thanks in advance for any help - hoping we can use this nice-looking plug-in...

Ok I did figure it out. Turns out, the star.gif and delete.gif files have to be in the same folder as the CSS files (a bit unusual, but now that I know I can change it).

Suggestion: put that in the instructions... :-)
